title: Herbs Oil 110: Aceite de hierbas Relajante Natural NATURA & BENESSERE
text:
La presencia de numerosas plantas con propiedades beneficiosas, hacen que Herbs Oil ayude a combatir los signos del cansancio de forma natural, rápida y eficaz.
COMPOSICIÓN INCI:
Propylene Glycol, Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil, Mentha Piperita Leaf Extract, Eucalytus Globulus Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara peel extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum Peel Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Leaf Extract, Melissa Officinalis Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris Leaf Extract, Cymbopogon Nardus Oil, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Olea Europea Fruit Extract, Melaleuca Leucadendron Cajaputi Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf Extract, Ilex Aquifolium Leaf Extract, Pimpinella Anisum seed Extract, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Juniperus Communis Fruit Extract, Eugenia Caryophyllus Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Seed Extract, Carum Carvi Seed Extract, Helychrysum italicum Extract, Viola Tricolor Extract, Origanum Majorana Leaf Extract, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol.
Aplicar de 3 a 10 gotas de Herbs Oil 110 en la zona a tratar (piernas, espalda, articulaciones, zona cervical). Masajear por 1 minuto para obtener una sensación inmediata de bienestar.
Herbs Oil 110 da una sensación de:
Relajación
Bienestar
Presentación:
100 ml
*PROVENIENTE DE CULTIVOS ORGÁNICOS
